name: YouTube Color
additional_info:
Though it's blue, I still included color setting, but keep in mind, to do color replacement properly you should edit code a bit by yourself. Recolor images, replace links, colors and replace hue-rotate value, that would be enough.

Bugs:
Subscribe button glitch
That's it I guess... But don't look in creative studio, please, there's lots of unexcepted bugs, I warned ya. Only this new works as excepted.

Works in both modes, day and night.
